amendment.description: An amendment numbered 29 printed in Part B of House Report 116-154 to require a report on the Terrorist Screening Database within 180 days after the enactment of the Intelligence Authorization Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Omar amendment (A029) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A029) offered by Ms. Omar.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Omar amendment (A029) Agreed to by voice vote.
